import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

%matplotlib inline
source.f056a9d0:
data['Is_joint_venture'] = data['Country'].apply(lambda c:'Joint Venture' if '/' in c else 'wholly-owned')
tmp = data[['Company','Is_joint_venture']].groupby('Is_joint_venture').count().reset_index()
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
plt.pie(tmp['Company'],labels=tmp['Is_joint_venture'])
plt.title('Proportion of join venture and wholly-owned')
plt.show()
source.53fc9fd1:
tmp = data[['Company','Valuation']]
plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
sns.histplot(data=tmp,x='Valuation')
plt.title('Distribution of valuation')
plt.show()
source.3dd6d5c5:
tmp = data[['Company','Industry']]
plt.subplots(figsize=(25,5))
sns.countplot(data=tmp,x='Industry')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('Number of each Industry')
plt.show()
source.3b481c75:
tmp = data[['Industry','Valuation']].groupby('Industry').sum().reset_index().sort_values(by='Valuation',ascending=False)
plt.subplots(figsize=(25,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='Industry',y='Valuation')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('Total valuation of each industry')
plt.show()
source.db5aa448:
tmp = data[['Company','Country_clean']]
plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
sns.countplot(data=tmp,x='Country_clean')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('Number of each country')
plt.show()
source.b8d9823c:
tmp = data[['Country_clean','Valuation']].groupby('Country_clean').sum().reset_index().sort_values(by='Valuation',ascending=False)
plt.subplots(figsize=(25,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='Country_clean',y='Valuation')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('Total valuation of each country')
plt.show()
